pages.text: Now that you have bees, you'll want to set them up in a house of their own, so they can start producing that sweet, sweet, honey! An apiary is ideally suited to this task - with easily-accessible space for bees, frames, and products, this wonderful little block is a beekeeper's (or, if you're feeling fancy, an apiarist's) best friend!

pages.title: The Humble Apiary
pages.text: You can use any type of comb to craft an apiary!

Once you've located a good spot to set up shop, just plop down your apiary and place your princess in the top slot and a drone in the bottom, and you're off to the races! A princess and drone combine into a queen, which will produce combs if fully satisfied. If the bar on the left turns red, just hover over it to see what else the queen needs to be satisfied.
